original_text: And he that sitteth on any thing whereon he sat that hath the issue shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자가 앉았던 자리에 앉는 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 씻을 것이요 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: And he that sitteth on any thing
whereon he sat that hath an issue
sentences.korean_translation: 유출증이 있는 사람이 앉았던 것 위에

sentences.original_text: and be unclean until the even
